message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $85, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob. I can do $82.50, but I really need to make a profit on this one.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $77.50. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I'm starting to think you're not serious about buying this product. I can do $82, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I think we're getting a bit stuck. I can do $81, but I'm really not willing to go any lower. This is my final offer.
